author: Andrii Voloshyn
title: Crypto-Targeted Promotion Campaign
description: There is a need to encourage entrepreneurs from outside the Cardano ecosystem to submit proposals to Catalyst
solution: Wit Crypto-Targeted promotion focused on existing people with knowledge and interest in cryptocurrency industry we will have good efficiency
experience:
4+ years in marketing for crypto projects

15+ years in online marketing

Good knowledge of Cardano ecosystem and other blockchains
